section.name: Magnolia
section.p: Magnolia is a free enterprise class content management system developed by obinary. Magnolia uses the upcoming standard API for java content repositories (JCR) to access its content. It has an easy to use web-browser interface, a clear API and a useful custom tag library for easy templating in JSP and Servlets.
